Subject: UPDATE DNS record for Eagle Insurance

Hi Clayton

Hope you’re keeping well.

I have a DNS update request today please (switching website host) for Eagle Insurance.

Can you please update below today and advise once done? I believe you managed the domain at your end now, please let me know otherwise if so.


1. Create/edit the A record to point to: 35.244.105.155
2. Create/edit a CNAME record to point https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eagleinsurance.com.au&c=E,1,eaIABnerYxqpeqManahLuGEppk8X5TfqtkyzLT0TLPWlH-iA_qpvb_sdU-klfG0xKRsUzB_WDikzFShC7Ytj9NCgMJBCZM3dEtCPiFUh-pmUuWHy95L8Dspt&typo=1
3. Once the changes above have been made, please notify us so we can finalise the SSL certificate

Thanks,
Nichole
